message.raw: fix palm board firmware so that it works for both left and right palms, switching by looking at magic bytes in the bootloader flash area. add test code for finger cycling test during manufacturing. add some ros parameters to enable/disable fingers.
message.html: fix palm board firmware so that it works for both left and right palms, switching by looking at magic bytes in the bootloader flash area. add test code for finger cycling test during manufacturing. add some ros parameters to enable/disable fingers.
